post.desc:
I just hope after the game she stops watching over the pyramid and move up and into to Gensōkyō. Quite a lonely and confined existence here. Even Yoshika has Seiga.

Huh... Sarutahiko – the patron god of the tengu [**according to Aya**](https://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/Symposium_of_Post-mysticism/Bunbunmaru_Newspaper_4) – is also conflated with Dōsojin. Though in this context it's most likely "the" Dōsojin and not "a" Dōsojin, so quite unlikely for Nareko to be Sarutahiko (and have Ame-no-Uzume as her wife). But the tengu connection is still there.
